meanings.definition: The inner and outer folds of the vulva.
meanings.sent1: The doctor examined her labia during the check-up.
meanings.sent2: She felt uncomfortable due to an irritation on her labia.
meanings.sent3: The labia of the flower petals were delicate and beautiful.
meanings.sent4: The labia of the curtains fluttered in the breeze.
meanings.sent5: The labia of the seashell resembled delicate lace.

meanings.sent1: His labia quivered with excitement as he spoke.
meanings.sent2: The labia of the wound needed stitches to heal properly.
meanings.sent3: The labia of the cup spilled over with hot tea.
meanings.sent4: The labia of the envelope sealed the important letter inside.
meanings.sent5: The labia of the canyon echoed with the sound of the waterfall.
